LanguageData.RB_ToxicBuildup.label: poisoned blood
LanguageData.RB_ToxicBuildup.description: Toxins in the bloodstream. This can come from various sources, including environmental toxins, venomous bites, or poisoned weapons. \nAt high doses, toxic buildup is lethal. Even at low doses, it can generate cancers. \nContrary to base game toxic buildup, creatures who die with this toxic damage can be eaten.
LanguageData.RB_ToxicBuildup.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.RB_ToxicBuildup.stages.1.label: initial
LanguageData.RB_ToxicBuildup.stages.2.label: minor
LanguageData.RB_ToxicBuildup.stages.3.label: moderate
LanguageData.RB_ToxicBuildup.stages.4.label: serious
LanguageData.RB_ToxicBuildup.stages.5.label: extreme
LanguageData.RB_ChemfuelBuildup.label: injected chemfuel
LanguageData.RB_ChemfuelBuildup.description: Chemfuel in the bloodstream. \nAt high doses, this is lethal. Even at low doses, it can generate cancers. \nContrary to base game toxic buildup, creatures who die with injected chemfuel can be eaten.
LanguageData.RB_ChemfuelBuildup.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.RB_ChemfuelBuildup.stages.1.label: initial
LanguageData.RB_ChemfuelBuildup.stages.2.label: minor
LanguageData.RB_ChemfuelBuildup.stages.3.label: moderate
LanguageData.RB_ChemfuelBuildup.stages.4.label: serious
LanguageData.RB_ChemfuelBuildup.stages.5.label: extreme
LanguageData.RB_BlindingBuildup.label: blinding venom
LanguageData.RB_BlindingBuildup.description: Blinding venom in the bloodstream. This venom is not lethal, but it will last for a while before it stops affecting sight.
LanguageData.RB_BlindingBuildup.stages.0.label: initial-hidden
LanguageData.RB_BlindingBuildup.stages.1.label: initial
LanguageData.RB_BlindingBuildup.stages.2.label: minor
LanguageData.RB_BlindingBuildup.stages.3.label: moderate
LanguageData.RB_BlindingBuildup.stages.4.label: serious
LanguageData.RB_BlindingBuildup.stages.5.label: extreme
LanguageData.RB_BlindingBuildup.stages.6.label: nauseating
LanguageData.RB_ParalysisBuildup.label: paralysis
LanguageData.RB_ParalysisBuildup.description: A fast acting toxin is coursing through this creature's veins, paralyzing his muscles. It will wear off after a while.
LanguageData.RB_ParalysisBuildup.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.RB_ParalysisBuildup.stages.1.label: stunned
LanguageData.RB_ParalysisBuildup.stages.2.label: very stunned
LanguageData.RB_ParalysisBuildup.stages.3.label: paralysed
LanguageData.RB_Stamina.label: increased stamina (from honey)
LanguageData.RB_Stamina.description: Genetic honey is strengthening this creature's stamina.
